disableOnboarding.title: Disable onboarding process
disableOnboarding.description: Automatically enables the extension without showing the onboarding process

disableUserControl.title: Disable user control
disableUserControl.description: Prevents access to the settings page and hides UI elements that allow the user to interact with the extension

disableUserAccount.title: Disable user account
disableUserAccount.description: Prevents the user from creating an account or logging in

disableTrackersPreview.title: Disable trackers preview
disableTrackersPreview.description: Prevents the user from viewing the trackers wheel on SERPs

trustedDomains.title: Trusted domains
trustedDomains.description: Defines a list of domains that are trusted by default
